summary: The video shows a split-screen of two men during a presidential debate broadcasted on CNN. One man is wearing a blue suit with a red tie, while the other is in a black suit with a blue tie. The text overlay reads 'My favorite part of the debate was watching whoever wasn't talking.' The scene captures moments when neither candidate is speaking, highlighting the awkward silences during the debate. The video ends with a voice-over saying 'Thanks for watching!'
keywords: presidential debate, CNN, awkward silence, political debate, election, campaign, candidates, speechless, political event
